column4: i have a problem regarding installation of xubuntu. At certain moment when Xubuntu should start from the live cd my monitor starts to blink (as it would autost the screen resolution) then is stops at the default (and empty) blue screen of Xfce, i tryed to start also with ubuntu then the same thing happended just the color of the screen was ubuntu's light brown. computer: pIII 224 ram. Any ideas?
yes
but the same thin happens with ubuntu
and in the xubuntu channel nobody answers
you have a minimal comp. for ubuntu
are you installing or using the live cd?
if you install you can use single user mode to work with X from the command line
use alternative, install and use the terminal
I think it is a ram issue, although I don't your graphics card
what is your graphics card?
so its enough
NO
I suggest using alternative install then use single user mode
just install like you normally would
when it restarts and you see grub there are 2 options either single user of the normal
but it does not even restart
you want to install without graphics
you have tried in non-graphical mode?
I am sorry I don't have enough information
I would try xubunu, they are used to dealing with a minimal set up like the one u have
#xubuntu
